name: compare-vuepress
description: Comparision of VuePress, Docusaurus and GitBook.
author: Warren Anderson

scripts.test:links:prod: for file in $(find ./docs/dao-members ./docs/airnode/pre-alpha -path ./node_modules -prune -false -o -name "*.md"); do markdown-link-check --verbose --config .github/workflows/markdown-link-check.config.json "$file" || exit 1; done;
scripts.test:links:next: for file in $(find ./docs/airnode/next -path ./node_modules -prune -false -o -name "*.md"); do markdown-link-check --verbose --config .github/workflows/markdown-link-check.config.json "$file" || exit 1; done;
scripts.docs:dev: yarn copy:navbar; yarn copy:sidebar; yarn copy:searchbox; vuepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: yarn copy:navbar; yarn copy:sidebar; yarn copy:searchbox; vuepress build docs
